eeta amatharawa manawa sampath sanwardhanayata da rajaya wada satahan rasak kriyathmaka kara thibe.yauwana katayuthu amathyanshaya, gowijana sewa amathyanshaya, widya thakshana amathyanshaya, adhyapana amathyanshaya, parisara amathyanshaya mangin tharuna tharuniyan dahas gananakata swayan rakiya puhunuwa, krushikarmika puhunuwa, karmika puhunuwa labadime wruththiya puhunu kirim, swayan rakiya sandaha puhunu kirim, kusalatha sanwardhana puhunu wadasatahan rashiyak monaragala di pawathwiya.rajya bankuwala udaw athiwa swayan rakiya labhinta adu poli naya labadime wadasatahanak da kriyawata nanwa thibe.

sanwardhana lotharayiya sama witama nawum bawin yuthu lotharayipath wele\palata idiripath karamin me rate janathawata sihiwatana thaba athi athara, eya thawaduratath thahawuru karamin "niyatha jaya" namin nawa dinum adina lotharayiyak sama angaharuwada ha sikurada dinum adimata welendapalata idiripath kirimata thiranaya kara atha. 2011 nowambar masa 16 wani dina welendapalata nikuth kala athara "niyatha jaya" lotharayiye prathama dinum adima 2011 nowambar masa 22 pawathwana ladi.

shri lankawedi nagarika kamkaru panthiya, gambadata wena wita adu aadayamlabhin saha yam yam kula atharath , wiplawiya hagim athi tharuna wayasath kominiyust saha samasamaja deshapalana pakshala walata kisiyam sthawarayak thibuna. 1956 di shri lanka nidahas pakshaye aagamanayath samagama gambadawa pawathi kominiyust saha samasamajawadi desapalana nambauruwa tikin tika diyawi giya.1948-1970 dakwa pawathi dakshinanshika saha ardha dakshinanshika aandu thula thibu hithuwakkari piliwetha nisa janatha wimukthi peramuna anek wamanshika deshapalana peramunu bord lali walata sima karamin peramuna gaththa. 1970 di janatha wimukthi peramuna wisin gambadawa pawathi dakshinanshika saha ardha dakshinanshika deshapalana eekadhikari nayakathwayen piditha kotas ekras karagena nishpadanaya kala ‚Äúwe guwera ‚Äú wyaparaya apa hadunagath palamu thrasthawadi wyaparayayi.namuth 1956 ejapa palamu dekada wime patan rajya thrasthawadaya merata pawathuna.gambada menma nagarikawada ekala mathiwarana waladi ejapaya prathiwiruddha pakshikayan ge mathiwarana sahabhagithwaya walakwuwe polu muguru, ath bomba, kadu kinisi, wani prathamika yuda upakarana bhawithayen.suprasiddha wayao mathiwaranayath thrasthawadayak.
